name: You Will Die (Cole Dunham)
description:
Delay the inevitable! There's a dragon approaching your village, and there's nothing you can do to stop it. However, the villagers might be able to be saved... but you will have to die first.

You lose when you die or the whole village is wiped out.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows to move

Left click to attack

Q when near villagers to have them follow you

X to have villagers stop following you

E to talk to villagers

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50

Made by Cole Dunham, Joe Wood, Sean Akins, Zion Jones, and Casey Fogwell
